title: Are you serious?
body:
A Call for Removal of League Chat in non premades. 
(people cant handle any criticism)

*Yes I got a 14 day suspension* for having a similar, non flaming but criticizing in chat.

So, a MF is flaming top, and abandoning bot lane. Complaining constantly, and I say this: 

(The messed up part is they only show one side of the chat)
I literally cannot understand why this game is so censored, and what you got chat punished for is pathetic.
This game is so full of care bear, I feel like I am attending Los Angeles Area Elementary school.
***Perma Banned***
Can someone tell me why that is deserved perma ban? (lvl 300 account)

Game 1
Pre-Game
PaperTyga: jg
PaperTyga: 5th lobby a charm
In-Game
PaperTyga: leash plz
PaperTyga: had to afk 2 mins for phone
PaperTyga: i fell behind too lol
-'mid pinged for assistance' mord had 5 kills already'
PaperTyga: i cant i gotta shut down this mord
-as I come to help teemo
PaperTyga: dont push him out
-shutdown mord for 1k, and 5 mins later....
PaperTyga: fed him much teemo?
Teemo "I only died 5 times"
PaperTyga: and 60 cs
PaperTyga: so thats 10 waves
PaperTyga: so really its 9 deaths gold equiv
"sej starts taking jg camps while losing turret(s) in bot lane
PaperTyga: now sej taking jg lol
"agreeing with MF"
PaperTyga: what a troll
-MF wants to FF here and explains why we should
PaperTyga: cause you throwing it
PaperTyga: stay in your lane nub
MF "WAAAH MORD IS SO FED"
PaperTyga: your point ? we could still group him
"this is where MF starts to run down mid to int"
PaperTyga: reporting mf
"She is complaining her bot is fed"
PaperTyga: thats your fault
PaperTyga: reporting mf inting and giving up griefing
-She blames loss of game on Teemo
PaperTyga: stfu you the one throwing game
PaperTyga: you intentionally fed just there
PaperTyga: youve been afking
PaperTyga: you dont stay in bot
PaperTyga: you screwed brands lane xp (she switched to mid lane, stole brand cs, and xp at minute 7?)
PaperTyga: who is the only other player on team
MF "I cant cs I only have 200k mastery on MF and the other MF has 1 million, and "sejuani messing up my CS"
PaperTyga: get better
-More flaming of the teemo, who had same record as MF at the time.
PaperTyga: you are 0/6 with MF
-continued to flame switched to caps make sure she can read it
PaperTyga: SRIOUSLY MF 0/6
PaperTyga: dont even say shit bout teemo
PaperTyga: atleast he had op champ to play vs (mordekaiser)
PaperTyga: you played vs mundo as supp
PaperTyga: cry more
PaperTyga: OOOO NO
PaperTyga: same record as you
PaperTyga: and hes not crying in chat
"MF excusing herself from feeding and afking because of opponents mastery"
PaperTyga: exactly mastery dont mean shit this is my 2nd time vi
-Beginning of a comeback.
PaperTyga: see ez
PaperTyga: kill 4 no deaths for us
-She starts whining again about teemo
PaperTyga: omg cry less seriously maybe you can get off tilt
PaperTyga: death timers getting 30s+
PaperTyga: stop making excuses to throw the game
PaperTyga: you only build that when you are good at mf   -She rushed ghostblade first.....
PaperTyga: teemo throwing -Teemo afk'd last 5 mins.
Post-Game
PaperTyga: legit plz report MF/TEEMO/Sejuani
PaperTyga: MF int'd and griefed, while flaming
PaperTyga: teemo afk'd auto'ing minions and died multiple times
PaperTyga: and sejuani wouldnt play as 'supp'

replies.body:
Asking for reports, and basically just flaming your team the whole game, there's nothing positive in your chat logs

I'm going to assume that you've had a 14 day ban (If not, contact riot support)
On your 14 day ban report card it CLEARLY said that the next offence will lead to a permanent ban
So yeah, it's a deserved ban at that point

If you could see why i would ask for reports (their side of the chat log) teemo literally int'd afk'd sejuani (as support) trolled bot lane stealing cs and jungle, and MF whined all game. They deserved a report. You have to imagine what they said to get a response like that. Did I hurt their feelies?
Regardless nothing I said was really offensive, just pointed out the facts, ie "MF you have same record as teemo" "dont talk shit"
I was also the only one trying to keep the team going "See we killed 4 with no deaths" "ez"

> [{quoted}](name=PaperTyga,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6qAUY3Ek,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-06-20T18:40:13.023+0000)
>
> If you could see why i would ask for reports (their side of the chat log) teemo literally int'd afk'd sejuani (as support) trolled bot lane stealing cs and jungle, and MF whined all game. They deserved a report. You have to imagine what they said to get a response like that. Did I hurt their feelies?
> Regardless nothing I said was really offensive, just pointed out the facts, ie "MF you have same record as teemo" "dont talk shit"
> I was also the only one trying to keep the team going "See we killed 4 with no deaths" "ez"

And? Asking for reports is still unnecessary toxicity and completely unneeded 
You were still very toxic and breaking the rules
Probably didn't hurt anyone's feelings. But it's still against the rules to be toxic. The game is supposed to be fun etc, toxic people ain't fun
And the 14 day ban report card said that the next offence will lead to a permanent ban
So there you go. A permanent ban for breaking the rules

Calling for reports, is something riot encourages if they truly deserve the report, which in this case they did. How is that toxic?

This is exactly what the problem is with this game, there is such a thing as a 'toxic' player. But everyone throws it around like a bunch of SJW, cry babies here. Anything that does not conform to that players POV is called toxic.

Riot says to NOT call for reports. Only one report is needed per game to flag the game for review. Calling for reports just makes your allies angry at you, it does nothing to help. Last time someone said to report you in game, what did you do? Start talking back and being toxic, calling them out on their mistakes? Thats what 99% of people who get banned for chat do. Calling people out in game does nothing besides make that person play worse because theyâ€™re angry at you.
The IFS is hyper strict after a 14 day ban. Just being negative will result in a permaban
so after any 14 day ban, no criticism or anything that could slightly hurt anyones feelies is allowed.

> [{quoted}](name=PaperTyga,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6qAUY3Ek,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-06-20T18:41:28.469+0000)
>
> so after any 14 day ban, no criticism or anything that could slightly hurt anyones feelies is allowed.

Yep; it's a pretty fucking bad system
do you even pla this game? you are so consistant on the boards with the same old message thats wrong I feel like you dont lol

> [{quoted}](name=TheSnowyLeopard,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6qAUY3Ek,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-20T20:13:42.296+0000)
>
> do you even pla this game? you are so consistant on the boards with the same old message thats wrong I feel like you dont lol

Yes if you bothered to glance at my match history in this very account

oh im sorry, the last time I checked it said 2018. becuse you play on this account for like a month every year. why? you obviously dont like the system lol, and are just spreading negativity? Im genuinely curious now

it literally goes from things like 6/15/19 
to 6/13/18 lmao,

> Can someone tell me why that is deserved perma ban? (lvl 300 account)

Because when you got your 14-day suspension it told you that any further negative behavior would result in a permaban. You decided that having diarrhea of the keyboard was worth more than your account, so here you are.
But what was bad about it? How was it offensive? I was only stating facts.

Do any of your facts get you closer to winning the game? Just because you're stating facts doesn't mean you're being constructive.

There's a big difference between something like, "Hey MF, we should play careful for now." and

>PaperTyga: get better
PaperTyga: you are 0/6 with MF
PaperTyga: SRIOUSLY MF 0/6

You are 100% in the wrong.
She was blaming teemo for throwing the game, All I stated was she has the same record.
So she was derailing the game...and you helped by being a 2nd person to derail the game.

Yup I derailed the game while engaging in every fight and making effort to carry. I guess I could post the match stats too.
(by far the only + KD player on team)
You can play well **and** derail the game with unnecessary typing. Come on man. This is easier if you accept what you did right **and** what you did wrong.
mute them

When you got your 14-day suspension, you were emphatically and sternly warned that any more misbehavior would result in a permaban. You spent the entire match arguing, screaming, and swearing at your teammates, so you're permabanned.
It was  about 20 mins in, I spent maybe 1 minute typing all that. I didnt scream it text? I didnt swear?

> [{quoted}](name=PaperTyga,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6qAUY3Ek,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-06-20T19:11:07.360+0000)
>
> It was  about 20 mins in

The fifth chat message you sent in game:

> PaperTyga: fed him much teemo?

You said almost nothing for 20 minutes?

> [{quoted}](name=PaperTyga,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6qAUY3Ek,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-06-20T19:11:07.360+0000)
>
> I spent maybe 1 minute typing all that.

From "fed him much teemo?" to "teemo throwing" there were around 183 words (methodology: count of regex matches of "\S+"). Congratulations, you're one of the fastest typists in the entire world... while standing idle and typing instead of trying to win.

> [{quoted}](name=PaperTyga,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6qAUY3Ek,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-06-20T19:11:07.360+0000)
>
> I didnt scream it text?

Well...

> PaperTyga: SRIOUSLY MF 0/6
> ...
> PaperTyga: OOOO NO

Hm.

> [{quoted}](name=PaperTyga,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6qAUY3Ek,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-06-20T19:11:07.360+0000)
>
> I didnt swear?

Well...

> PaperTyga: stfu you the one throwing game

Hm.

And you occasionally swore for emphasis while harassing and arguing with your team, which isn't quite as bad as swearing at them, but isn't much better, either:

> PaperTyga: dont even say shit bout teemo
> ...
> PaperTyga: aexactly mastery dont mean shit this is my 2nd time vi

Your ongoing refusal to understand and take responsibility for your misbehavior is exactly what led to your permaban. It means that Riot would rather remove you from the game than continue to allow you to run rampant.

LOL I do type 140 WPM. So ya maybe minute and a half. And that was not 1.5 mins straight through, not playing the game. I responded with each line to respond to the flaming MF. Which probably took oOooOo 2 seconds per statement.

Because you cannot see the rest of chat log, I was actually defending teemo the entire time, after MF flamed him into afking. I then stated how since he afkd he threw the game, when we were coming back.


The funny part is, everyone is acting like words hurt them so much anymore, no one can have an opinion, express it, or simply state the truth. 'RUN RAMPANT' is hilarious to me. I am such a bad boy, butthurt effin babies.

> [{quoted}](name=PaperTyga,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=6qAUY3Ek,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2019-06-20T21:03:47.708+0000)
>
> LOL I do type 140 WPM. So ya maybe minute and a half. And that was not 1.5 mins straight through, not playing the game. I responded with each line to respond to the flaming MF. Which probably took oOooOo 2 seconds per statement.
> 
> Because you cannot see the rest of chat log, I was actually defending teemo the entire time, after MF flamed him into afking. I then stated how since he afkd he threw the game, when we were coming back.
> 
> 
> The funny part is, everyone is acting like words hurt them so much anymore, no one can have an opinion, express it, or simply state the truth. 'RUN RAMPANT' is hilarious to me. I am such a bad boy, butthurt effin babies.

This is why you are permabanned. Good luck in your future endeavors.
o the last comment? Sure I guess I am the only person in this game (or american society) that has skin anymore.

you might want to fix your ego too, as on top of your toxicity in and out of the game, you seem to also be uptight and arrogant, kinda what I expect from a near level 300 that mains ARAM and blind pick lmao
I rarely play on this account, but I still play daily on my main

I do not know any other online game this care bear, where you cannot criticize ANY one, without some kind of punishment.

The people that keep throwing around 'toxic' should go play some my little pony game, or some game that is not PVP, and team based.
